The first A.I. Conveyancing Software Platform for Ontario Real Estate Lawyers & Clerks

Ready to Get Started?

Which conveyancing software do you currently use?

Let’s Get to Work

Our Trusted Integration & Membership Partners

Why Choose iClose

It is the first A.I. conveyancing software platform that was designed by real estate lawyers & clerks for real estate lawyers & clerks. It includes all of the essential needs to run a real estate firm into one cohesive platform.

  • iClose is a Web-Based Application!

    We’re a web-based application, meaning all you need to use iClose is an internet connection. You do not need servers and other expensive IT infrastructure

  • It’s Easy to Transition to iClose

    We understand that switching conveyancing platforms can be quite an undertaking; that’s why we have simplified the transition onto iClose

  • iClose is a Canadian company

    We are proudly a Canadian company. All data is stored in Canada at three (3) different tier 3 data centers throughout Canada.

  • Up to 500% cheaper than the competition

    iClose is very competitively priced. iClose is $25 plus HST, up to 500% less than the competition while providing more functionalities and a superior user experience

Plus

iClose has all the file transaction types you need

When designing iClose, we wanted to ensure that all real estate transaction types were included and streamlined.

iClose makes client sign-ups simple

You can achieve all this and more with one platform and one software, all while saving time and money!

Within our platform, you can:

  • 01.
    Easily schedule your clients documentation signing
  • 02.
    Obtain your client’s documents
  • 03.
    Verify your client’s identity
  • 04.
    Distribute your clients executed documents
  • 05.
    Sign your client’s documents
  • 06.
    Screenshare your client’s documents

iClose works while you sleep

iClose can be programmed to follow up on all post closing matters, discharge statements, outstanding client docs etc. Freeing up your time for what is most important to you

Start Your Free Trial

iClose is Transforming Real Estate Transactions

Try the first A.I. Real Estate Conveyancing Software Platform

  • Get FREE Software Credits

    iClose will give you free transaction software credits so you are not out of pocket for transactions already purchased in our competition’s software

    Try iClose for Free!

  • Low Software Charges Per Transaction

    iClose only charges $25 plus HST per transaction

    Try iClose for Free!

  • Open Multiple File Types

    Unlike the competition, you can open multiple file types: Purchase, Sale, Mortgage Refinances
    PLUS: Title Transfer
    & Assignment files

    Try iClose for Free!

  • Integrated Document Production

    iClose includes integrated document production, a document management system, and a client portal. All included within our low fee

    Try iClose for Free!

  • Integrated Video Conferencing

    iClose’s integrated video conferencing offers original source signatures all within one platform. With iClose, you can sign up clients anywhere in the world

    Try iClose for Free!

  • Integrates with Your Software

    iClose is set up to directly integrate with First Canadian Title, Chicago Title, Teranet Connect, LLC/MMS, and Verified.Me

    Try iClose for Free!

We’re up to 500% Cheaper
Than the Competition.
We’re Competitively Priced to Save You Both Time and Money

iClose is only $25 plus HST per transaction which is up to 500% less than the competition.
iClose is sympathetic to the cost’s lawyers bear when transitioning from one conveyancing platform to another and accordingly, will be providing FREE software transaction credits to lawyers to offset any costs that lawyers have already spent for files in other platforms.

*visit iClose.ca/migration for more details.
